Name: Rude Gypsy
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Nick & Nora glass .
Prepare garnish of lime zest twist.
Express lime zest twist over the cocktail and use as garnish.
Review: Tequila shines in this delightfully honeyed and herbal cocktail.
History: A riff on the classic Gypsy Queen by yours truly. (Cocktails based on tequila are often termed 'rude', as in the Rude Cosmopolitan ).
Nutrition: One serving of Rude Gypsy contains 173 calories
